recipe_name: Roxy's caramelised fruits with a Grand Marnier cream
method: Put the butter and sugar in a small, heavy-bottomed frying pan. Heat gently, stirring all the while.  When the sugar has nearly melted, add the fruit. Cook for 2-3 minutes, or until the fruit is soft and caramelised. Meanwhile, stir the Grand Marnier into the cream. Serve the fruit with a spoon of cream and top with a sprinkling of orange zest.
ingredients: 50g/2oz butter,  100g/3½oz brown sugar,  4 ripe plums, halved and stoned,  2 ripe Conference pears, sliced,  2 Cox apples, cored and sliced,  227g/8¼oz tub clotted cream,  2 tsp Grand Marnier,  ½ orange, zest only
